by  Harrison Kaminsky  News Editor  March  

Academy Awardwinning director and producer Lee Daniels will visit Pitt this spring to speak to students in the William Pitt Union PERIOD

Pitt Program Council will host Daniels lecture about his life and career on Thursday March  in the Assembly Room at  p.m PERIOD Free tickets  with a maximum of two per person  will be available March  in the PPC ticket office on the ground floor of the WPU according to a PPC release PERIOD Doors open at  p.m PERIOD

Daniels an American actor film producer and director kickstarted his career with the  film Monsters Ball  a romantic drama about a poor Southern womans love for a widowed prisonguard which starred Billy Bob Thornton Heath Ledger and Halle Berry PERIOD In  he directed and produced Precious a drama based in Harlem in  that won two of the six Academy Awards for which it was nominated PERIOD Daniels was also the first AfricanAmerican to be nominated for a Directors Guild of America Award for Outstanding Directorial Achievement in Feature Film. in  Daniels directed and produced The Butler which grossed  million worldwide PERIOD Most recently Daniels produces Empire a new television series on Fox starring Terrence Howard Taraji Henson and Gabourey Sidibe PERIOD

According to PPC lecture director Lindsy Steinberger Daniels lecture will focus on his experiences throughout his career and later open for attendees questions PERIOD

Due to Daniels extensive film career Steinberger expects the lecture to sell out PERIOD

Daniels has written and directed films and TV shows that are devoted to social and racial inequality issues Steinberger said PERIOD PPC believes that Daniels lecture will be educational and inspirational to students on campus. steinberger acknowledged that Pitt students sometimes critique PPC speaker announcements and said since Pitt is such a large and diverse campus PPC cant satisfy every person with each lecture PERIOD

If some people are displeased with a lecture choice hopefully PPC can please them with another lecture Steinberger said PERIOD

According to executive board director Jon Lehan Daniels availability and pricing best fit the kind of show PPC sought to produce PERIOD Because of contract stipulations PPC could not disclose the price it paid for him to speak at Pitt PERIOD

Steinberger and the lecture committee which is comprised of roughly  to  students began planning the lecture this January PERIOD

The group brainstormed speakers that they believed would be of interest to the students at Pitt PERIOD

PPC could not disclose the ideas for speakers because some can still be a possibility for a future lecture PERIOD

Steinberger said Daniels career work includes many works that resonate with different people PERIOD

Students have many outstanding works to choose from Daniels career including The Butler Precious Monsters Ball and Empire she said PERIOD
